Articles.Content: first serious launch. I think I used too much rocket.

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky
congradulations! you have givin the solar system its first artificial satalight!
What is this 'too much rocket' you speak of?
Just like 'More Dakka', there can never be enough rocket.
How about a picture of the rocket?

It wasn\'t anything special. Just a stock kit with 4 fuel tanks on the upper stage, with 8 fuel/8 solid on the bottom, as far as I can remember.

Thinking back though, that picture was taken about 1 minute after I figured out what the 'm' key was for.

'Hey, where did the planet go?'

Just one thing, on these forums be aware for Capt\'n Skunky. It may not look like it at first glance but he is my evil twin brother out to do good for the world. He must be stopped at all costs.

Their is a gun taped under your seat, with instructions on what to do, I am relying on you. good luck. Of corse I am kidding. I would never get someone like you to do that, a trainned assasin?
